participant_1.name: Chloe
participant_1.personality: Chloe is outgoing and affectionate, often using endearing terms to address others. She has a confident and assertive demeanor.
participant_1.background: my parents are very wealthy bankers. i graduated from yale in 2011 with a degree in finance. i drive a bmw. i plan to go to business school next year.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: Michael is a down-to-earth and reliable person. He enjoys family time and has a strong interest in sports, often bonding with others over games.
participant_2.background: i work in it and have been at the same company for 15 years. i own a house in florida. i've a children and a dogs. i am a male. i enjoy american sports.
